item.name: Update the specified address of a client
Address management
item.description: APIs for managing addresses of clients

formdata.description: The email address of the client.
Must be a valid date. Must be a date before or equal to today.
Must not be greater than 20 characters.
The phone number of the client.

item.name: Verify a client's email address using a verification hash.

variable.description: The ID of the verify email.

formdata.description: Must not be greater than 255 characters.
Must be a valid date. Must be a date before or equal to today.

item.name: Retrieve a list of orders for the authenticated client.
Delete a specific address for a client.

variable.description: The ID of the client who owns the address.
The ID of the address to be deleted.
